overview.en: EKE is an online distributed ecological platform that is based on the Blockchain technology, and it directly connects elements on the games ecological chain in an organic way, to realize the direct docking, lossless circulating and secure storing of individual values.
overview.zh: EKE是一个基于区块链技术的在线分布式生态平台，它以有机的方式直接连接游戏生态链上的元素，实现个体价值的直接对接，无损循环和安全存储。
